title: Woody Woodpecker in 'Sleep happy'
creator_credit: United World Films, Walter Lantz Productions and Walter Lantz
brief_description: When Woody finds himself unable to sleep he decides to crash for the night at Wally Walrus’s boarding home. Unfortunately for Wally however, the tables are turned when he cannot sleep because of Woody’s loud snoring. Wally proceeds to take action in putting a halt to Woody’s snoring.
